law.catch_line: Rating of proposed revenue bonds required.
law.text: Each proposed revenue bond shall be rated by Moody's Investors Service, Inc. or an equivalent bond rating agency. No revenue bond issued may be sold that does not receive a Moody's rating of at least A or the equivalent rating by another qualified bond rating agency.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
